product_description: Tuck this generously sized, quilted clutch under your arm, or attach the chain strap to swing the versatile faux-leather style over your shoulder.
product_details_and_care:
Tuck this generously sized, quilted clutch under your arm, or attach the chain strap to swing the versatile faux-leather style over your shoulder.
